text: The End of the Affair is a 1955 British romantic drama movie directed by Edward Dmytryk and based on the 1951 novel of the same name by Graham Greene. It stars Deborah Kerr, Van Johnson, John Mills, Peter Cushing, Stephen Murray, Elsie Wagstaff and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was remade in 1999. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 romantic drama movies Category:British romantic drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Edward Dmytryk Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: The End of the Affair (1955 movie)
